entries.title: Book Review — Between Light And Storm: How We Live With Other Species, By Esther Woolfson
entries.description: Scala Naturae is a belief that humans sit at the very top of the “chain of being” of living creatures on Earth. Between Light and Storm takes a long and graceful look at that idea, suggesting that it sweeps humans right out of harmony with the rest of creation.

entries.title: YouTube TV In Talks To Acquire NFL Sunday Ticket Rights

entries.title: Should Machines Replace “Leaders”? Even Jack Welch?
entries.description: Leaders can be inconsistent, weak, driven by vested interests, vindictive, uninformed, influenced by friends, fearful (of lots of things), and inaccessible. They also frequently abuse their power until it’s all gone. Could machines lead better? Can algorithms replace flawed human decision-making?
